description: Stone base texture with organic-looking coal veins and deposits

base_colors.note: Stone base color same as stone block but slightly darker: r = 110 + coalStoneBase * 25

vein_detection.note: Coal veins appear when veinFactor > 0.7 for more organic looking distribution

vein_size_calculation.note: Vein appears when veinSize > 0.6, controls size and shape of coal deposits

coal_colors.note: Dark coal color with slight variation based on vein size

dark_spots.description: Dark coal veins approximating organic distribution

patterns.note: Tertiary coal vein pattern for organic appearance

color_adjustment.note: Transform stone color to dark coal (stone ~135 -> coal ~50)

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate stone base noise: sin(x*0.8 + y*0.2)*0.3 + cos(x*0.3 + y*0.7)*0.3 + sin((x+y)*0.5)*0.4
generation_algorithm.step3: Apply stone base colors: r = 110 + coalStoneBase * 25, g = 110 + coalStoneBase * 25, b = 115 + coalStoneBase * 25
generation_algorithm.step4: Calculate vein factor: veinFactor = sin(x * 1.5 + y * 1.7) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step5: If veinFactor > 0.7, calculate vein size: veinSize = sin((x + y) * 0.8) * 0.3 + 0.7
generation_algorithm.step6: If veinSize > 0.6, replace with coal colors: r = 40 + veinSize * 20, g = 40 + veinSize * 20, b = 40 + veinSize * 20
generation_algorithm.step7: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range
generation_algorithm.note: Two-stage generation: stone base + organic coal vein overlay

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded COAL_ORE texture algorithm

validation_notes.pattern_complexity: Triple noise stone base with dual-condition coal vein system
validation_notes.coordinate_system: Uses global coordinates for consistent mineral distribution

technical_notes: Coal color range: RGB 40-60 (dark with subtle variation)
